tool_description:
ReSpeak is a lightweight AI-based paraphraser API that allows rephrasing the text (rewriter, rephrase, paraphrase). It helps to remove plagiarism easily!

Requirements:
• Language: English
• Max text length for one request = 300 characters
name: Text Paraphraser
title: Text Paraphraser

api_list.name: rephrase
api_list.description: Provide the text (< 300 characters len) and the mode to rephrase the text.
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://text-paraphraser.p.rapidapi.com/paraphrase"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "text-paraphraser.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.post(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://text-paraphraser.p.rapidapi.com/paraphrase"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "text-paraphraser.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.post(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
